name: A and C apocalypse - #ZomaMustFall (Second Round)
description:
Game Description

A and C apocalypse is believed to be an answer to most South African gamers. A classic zombie video game that takes setting in the streets of Johannesburg featuring Zoma as a zombie. With our military and government crippled. A civil zombie apocalyptic war stroke out of hand leaving you as a player in the middle of the chaos. Your mission is to put a stop on Zoma with a shower head before he spreads the virus to the rest of the country.

The Game Open World:

WestudioGames has tried to re'imagine Johannesburg down-town in many ways. The game world is haunting and massive filled with a number of things that you'd expect when moving around the streets of Joburg. "Our aim was to deliver players around the globe to a so called Golden City - Johannesburg." Said our lead environmental designers.

Game Mechanics:

A and C apocalypse delivers traditional classic first person game-play drive mechanics. Fast paced shooting style, the game promise to deliver 60 FPS simultaneously even on low-end computers (it was originally designed for mobile devices).

Special Features:

* Cape Town Edition & JHB Edition.

* African traditional Home Made weapon package

* Elections Edition DLC

* Golden Shower Head

* A and C apocalypse Full Story Comic

Extra:

Download on itch now and redeem it on SteamPowered on release. All green-light voters will receive the Cape-Town Boat Combat DLC.
